outputs.output_descr:
1. Basic initial Capacity Development Training undertaken to facilitate the implementation of the Humanitarian Work Plan,
2. Capacity of Humanitarian Aid Commission (HAC) assessed and recommendations on Capacity Development Plans formulated to facilitate the implementation of the Humanitarian Work Plan,
3. Capacity of selected National Humanitarian Implementing Partners is assessed and recommendations on Capacity Development Plans formulated for a better implementation of HWP projects, 
4. A full-fledged Project Document on Capacity Development for National Humanitarian Actors in Sudan developed

project_descr: Support Capacity Assessment of Natioinal Humanitarian Actors in Sudan
project_title: Capacity Assessment of Natoinal Humanitarian Actors
